title: Can't login into client but can in website
body:
As the title follows. As you can see im inside of my acc mening that i know the username and passworld but i cant come into my league acc in client. I have tryed reinstaling the game switching regions loging even loging into my other 5 acc wont work.
An other issue i had before this was that bugsplats happens every second game sometimes it takes me out of the entire game when im playing making me behind by alot. 

Riot plz :D

replies.body: I am having this issue and am unable to login through the client as well.

HAHAHAHAH! Glad to hear you were able to access your account again. If you run into any issues like this in the future make sure to reach out to me! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

wow the moment i posted this the client worked.........................

TY riot magic!

Give me a np!
